title: How to read a League of Legends replay file?
body:
My buddy was asking to look at a game of mine recently, but we're not sure how he can open it. Does anyone know how to open up the replay file for the in game client downloaded games? 
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2508483044/45096153?tab=overview This is the game in particular, and I have already sent him the corresponding .rofl file.

replies.body: Replays are saved server side, so you'll want to download it then turn it into a highlight.  Once that's compiled, you can send that version to him.  Our[ replay guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) can offer some steps.  Hope that helps!
